alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Fayette; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 9:38PM CDT until July 22 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Fayette County in northeastern Iowa... Southwestern Winneshiek County in northeastern Iowa... Eastern Chickasaw County in northeastern Iowa... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 938 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lawler, or 8 miles northeast of New Hampton, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Waucoma around 950 PM CDT. Fredericksburg around 1000 PM CDT. Hawkeye around 1010 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include County Roads B 54 And V 56, Donnan, County Roads V 56 And B 33, Highway 93 And County V 68, Waucoma Campground, Jackson Junction and Alpha. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
